articles.author: Jaures Yip
articles.title: Are we in an AI bubble? What 40 tech leaders and analysts are saying, in one chart - CNBC
articles.description: OpenAI and Nvidia have gone on a blitz of AI infrastructure deals while hyperscalers continue to spend billions in capex.
articles.content:
Are we in an artificial intelligence bubble?
It's the debate that dominated the tech industry in 2025, and it's not going away anytime soon.
Record valuations and deals driven by major investments … [+2428 chars]
